function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate mixing of room air, leading to reduced effectiveness of upper-room UVGI fixtures","Impact":"Increased risk of TB infection transmission and spread in high-risk clinical settings","Mitigation":"Ensure adequate mixing of room air to optimize the effectiveness of upper-room UVGI fixtures","Technologies":"Room air circulation systems, air vents, and fans","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Facility management, infection control team"},{"Description":"Inconsistent control of temperature and relative humidity in rooms with upper-room UVGI fixtures","Impact":"Reduced efficiency and effectiveness of UVGI systems in controlling TB infection","Mitigation":"Control temperature between 68-75°F and relative humidity below 60% in rooms with upper-room UVGI fixtures","Technologies":"HVAC systems, dehumidifiers, temperature and humidity sensors","People":"Facility management, maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility management, maintenance team"},{"Description":"Inadequate UV fluence rate in the upper air of the room","Impact":"Decreased effectiveness of upper-room UVGI systems in controlling TB infection","Mitigation":"Ensure a higher UV fluence rate in the upper air of the room to maximize the effectiveness of the UVGI system","Technologies":"High-output UV lamps, UV sensor technology, UVGI system design optimization","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Facility management, infection control team"}]}
